title: Operation MAGNOLIA
content:
[[include :scp-wiki:info:start]]
**Magnolia**
**Author:** [[*user Djoric]]
This story involves a considerable amount of sensitive material; **Please read the following content warnings and proceed only if you are of the appropriate age and emotional state to engage with these topics.**

* Child abuse (Indirectly depicted; directly described)
* Child death
* Sexual assault, including CSA (Indirectly depicted; directly described)
* Other sexual content (Depicted)
* Extreme violence and gore
* Depiction of a mass shooting
* Depiction of torture
* Depiction of suicide & suicidal ideation
* Self-harm ideation
* Pet death (dog)
* Religious trauma
* Homophobic and racist slurs
* Unredacted clinical summary of Procedure 110-Montauk

[[include :scp-wiki:info:end]]
[[include :scp-wiki:component:info-cw]]
